Class RCTViewManager

    NativeModule

    public final class RCTViewManager
extends ViewGroupManager<com.facebook.react.flat.FlatViewGroup>
    ViewManager that creates instances of RCTView.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Specified by:
        getName in interface NativeModule
        Specified by:
        getName in class ViewManager<com.facebook.react.flat.FlatViewGroup,LayoutShadowNode>
        Returns:
        the name of this view manager. This will be the name used to reference this view manager from JavaScript in createReactNativeComponentClass.

      • getCommandsMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getCommandsMap()
        Description copied from class: ViewManager
        Subclasses of ViewManager that expect to receive commands through UIManagerModule.dispatchViewManagerCommand(int, int, com.facebook.react.bridge.ReadableArray) should override this method returning the map between names of the commands and IDs that are then used in ViewManager.receiveCommand(T, int, com.facebook.react.bridge.ReadableArray) method whenever the command is dispatched for this particular ViewManager. As an example we may consider ReactWebViewManager that expose the following commands: goBack, goForward, reload. In this case the map returned from ViewManager.getCommandsMap() from ReactWebViewManager will look as follows: { "goBack": 1, "goForward": 2, "reload": 3, } Now assuming that "reload" command is dispatched through UIManagerModule we trigger ReactWebViewManager#receiveCommand passing "3" as commandId argument.
        Overrides:
        getCommandsMap in class ViewManager<com.facebook.react.flat.FlatViewGroup,LayoutShadowNode>
        Returns:
        map of string to int mapping of the expected commands

      • createShadowNodeInstance

        public com.facebook.react.flat.RCTView createShadowNodeInstance()
        Description copied from class: ViewManager
        This method should return a subclass of ReactShadowNode which will be then used for measuring position and size of the view. In mose of the cases this should just return an instance of ReactShadowNode
        Overrides:
        createShadowNodeInstance in class ViewGroupManager<com.facebook.react.flat.FlatViewGroup>

      • getShadowNodeClass

        public java.lang.Class<com.facebook.react.flat.RCTView> getShadowNodeClass()
        Description copied from class: ViewManager
        This method should return Class instance that represent type of shadow node that this manager will return from ViewManager.createShadowNodeInstance(). This method will be used in the bridge initialization phase to collect properties exposed using ReactProp (or ReactPropGroup) annotation from the ReactShadowNode subclass specific for native view this manager provides.
        Overrides:
        getShadowNodeClass in class ViewGroupManager<com.facebook.react.flat.FlatViewGroup>
        Returns:
        Class object that represents type of shadow node used by this view manager.

      • receiveCommand

        public void receiveCommand(com.facebook.react.flat.FlatViewGroup view,
                           int commandId,
                           @Nullable
                           ReadableArray args)
        Description copied from class: ViewManager
        Subclasses may use this method to receive events/commands directly from JS through the UIManager. Good example of such a command would be scrollTo request with coordinates for a ScrollView or goBack request for a WebView instance.
        Overrides:
        receiveCommand in class ViewManager<com.facebook.react.flat.FlatViewGroup,LayoutShadowNode>
        Parameters:
        view - View instance that should receive the command
        commandId - code of the command
        args - optional arguments for the command
